title: Consumer spending in Pakistan 2013 - 2018 , per capita
summary: This statistic shows the Pakistan spending U.S. of 2013 2018 from 2013 to 2018 .
In 2016 , 1335 million units of 2013 2018 were sold worldwide .
gold: This statistic depicts consumer spending in Pakistan from 2013 to 2018 , per capita.
In 2013 , Pakistan 's consumer spending per capita was 995 U.S. dollars .
